title: Crime Alert 07.02.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 07.02.19
description:
Texas sisters killed by their father for dating. Millionaire's son gets life for murdering his father. Man gets almost two decades in prison for helping dispose of the body of his one time prom date.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
